alert.note: Alert for Stokes; Surry; Wilkes; Yadkin (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:46PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Surry, west central Stokes, northeastern Wilkes and northwestern Yadkin Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Flat Rock to Traphill. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mount Airy... Elkin... Fairview... Flat Rock... Jonesville... Dobson... and Pilot Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
